examples: Daddy, will you read me a story?

examples: Let Mommy kiss it better.

that mean Mommy

examples: That's her grandpa alright.

examples: My grandma bakes a delicious persimmon pie every Thanksgiving.

examples: The old man considered his granddaughter thoughtfully.

Rudy: I have a granddaughter.
words.defineEn: the daughter of our son or daughter
words.defineVi: con gái của con trai hay con gái của chúng tôi

examples: Her affection for her grandson was written all over the old lady's face.

words.defineVi: con trai của con trai hay con gái của chúng tôi

examples: The group has a new CD in the pipeline.

examples: Their family name, Phallaceae, alludes to these fungus’s distinctive shape.

People with a Scottish family name can buy and wear the family tartan.

examples: Car-rental companies are running background checks on drivers who rent for long periods.
